description: This table supplements the PAT_ENC table. It contains additional information related to patient encounters or appointments.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique system identifier of the patient encounter. Contact serial number is unique across all patients and all contacts.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date on which this patient encounter took place.

columns.name: COPAY_COINS_FLAG
columns.description: Set to 1 if copay is coinsurance.

columns.name: CAN_LET_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column links to the type of canceled appointment letter sent for this patient encounter. Some examples are "No Letter", "No Show","Cancelation Letter", etc. This category column is linked to ZC_LET.LET_C.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


No Letter

columns.name: SUP_PROV_ID
columns.description: This column contains the provider ID of the supervising provider for this patient encounter.

columns.name: SUP_PROV_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column links to information about the Type of Supervising provider. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


No Supervision

columns.name: SUP_PROV_REV_TM
columns.description: This column contains the date and time when the supervising provider submitted his or her review

columns.name: MEDS_REQUEST_PHR_ID
columns.description: The pharmacy identifier from which the medications were requested.

columns.name: MEDS_REQUEST_OP_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column contains information about the fill option for the medication request.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Left


Right

columns.name: PHYS_BP
columns.description: This contains the patient's blood pressure that was entered during the patient encounter.

columns.name: VITALS_TAKEN_TM
columns.description: Holds the time the vitals were taken

columns.name: PHYS_TEMP_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The source of the patient's temperature measurement.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Oral


Tympanic


Rectal


Axillary


Temporal


Skin


Bladder


Core


Esophageal

columns.name: PAT_PAIN_SCORE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column indicates how much pain the patient was in via pain score.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PAT_PAIN_LOC_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column contains information about which body part is experiencing discomfort.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PAT_PAIN_EDU_YN
columns.description:
This column contains information as to whether pain education questions were asked. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: PAT_PAIN_CMT
columns.description: This column contains comments that were entered pertaining to the patient's pain

columns.name: PAT_PAIN_SCALE_CAT
columns.description: This item stores the pain scale category under which the pain score is collected.

columns.name: SMOKING_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This simply stores information about whether the patient smokes, is quitting, etc. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Current/Former


Passive


Never

columns.name: PHYS_SPO2
columns.description: Contains the blood oxygen saturation value for this encounter.

columns.name: SYS_GEN_LOS_ID
columns.description: This column contains the system generated Level of Service information to link to the procedures tables.

columns.name: DOC_HX_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the source of entry for the history documentation.  This category column is linked to ZC_HISTORY_SOURCE.HISTORY_SOURCE_C.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Provider


Patient


Parent


Legal Guardian


Proxy User

columns.name: APPT_LET_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column links to the type of appointment letter that was sent to this patient for this patient encounter. Some examples are "No Letter", "Appt Letter", etc.  This category column is linked to ZC_LET.LET_C.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CAN_LET_C_NAME

columns.name: PARENT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: This item is a link to an encounter's parent encounter through the parent's contact serial number.  The contact serial number is the unique identifier for the encounter.

columns.name: SYNC_IP_DATA_C_NAME
columns.description:
This is a contact-specific flag to tell Chart Sync whether inpatient clinical data for this visit (such as medication administration or documentation flowsheet data) should be synchronized between deployments. A value of 1 (or Yes) means that inpatient clinical data has been, and will continue to be, synchronized for this visit. Note that this item can only be set for a contact whose type is (or was at some point) an inpatient admission.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: APPTMT_LET_INST
columns.description: If an appointment letter has been printed for this patient encounter, this column will list the date and time it was printed. If multiple letters were printed, we'll list the date and time of the most recent one.

columns.name: RESULT_LET_INST
columns.description: If a result letter has been printed for this patient encounter, this column will list the date and time it was printed. If multiple letters were printed, we'll list the date and time of the most recent one.

columns.name: RESCHED_LET_INST
columns.description: If a reschedule letter has been printed for this patient encounter, this column will list the date and time it was printed. If multiple letters were printed, we'll list the date and time of the most recent one.

columns.name: FOLLOW_LET_INST
columns.description: If a follow-up letter has been printed for this patient encounter, this column will list the date and time it was printed. If multiple letters were printed, we'll list the date and time of the most recent one.

columns.name: PHYS_PEAK_FLOW
columns.description: This column contains a measurement of the flow of air from the lungs: Peak Flow. If this column contains data, the measurement was taken during the associated encounter.

columns.name: ENC_SPEC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The encounter specialty item holds which of the encounter provider's specialties should be used for billing and reporting purposes for this encounter.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: LD_STATUS_YN
columns.description:
Flag to denote if the encounter is for a mother who will deliver


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: ADT_PAT_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the Admission/Discharge/Transfer (ADT) patient classification for this patient contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: OTHER_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: Stores "Other" Summary Blocks (non-IP, ED, OpTime)

columns.name: OTHER_BLOCK_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the specific type of the episode summary, whose ID is stored in I EPT 1970.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Ambulatory


Leader Rounds


Travel

columns.name: BILL_NUM
columns.description: Billing number, often used as an identifier in downstream systems.

columns.name: IP_DOC_CONTACT_CSN
columns.description: For Hospital Outpatient Visit (HOV) encounters, this column stores the unique contact serial number for the patient contact which is used for clinical documentation.  This can be set for appointment contacts if they are not converted to HOVs.

columns.name: TEMP_PT_HIS_C
columns.description:
This item shows the temporary patient history.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Temporary


Identified as New or Anonymous

columns.name: PRIMARY_PROCONT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the provider that is the primary contact for this patient encounter.

columns.name: PRIMARY_TEAM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the primary Provider Care Team for this patient encounter.

columns.name: PRIMARY_TEAM_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the record.

columns.name: MCIR_VACCINE_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient's eligibility code for Michigan's vaccination registry. This item only applies for the state of Michigan.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: VISIT_POS_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the facility that was the place of service for this encounter.

columns.name: NO_INTERP_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column holds the reason an interpreter is not needed for the visit (in the case of a patient who would normally require one). It is meant to be populated when the corresponding EPT 495-INTERPRETER NEEDED? value is "no".


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: CVG_ADD_DT
columns.description: The add date returned in the response message by the payor for the encounter. The add date is defined as the date that the payor added the patient as being covered.

columns.name: FARM_WORKER_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number of the patient's farm worker status for the encounter or appointment.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: KIOSK_HH_QUEST_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the health history template that is assigned to the patient encounter.

columns.name: KIOSK_HH_QUEST_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Visit Navigator (VN) History Template Definition (LQH) record.

columns.name: HSP_ACCT_ADV_DTTM
columns.description: If the Hospital Account Advisor is turned on, this item records the date and time that the advisor's recommendation was accepted or rejected.

columns.name: VISIT_VERIFIED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the visit is verified.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: VERIF_VISIT_DT
columns.description: The current date the visit contact was verified.

columns.name: VERIF_DATE_INIT_DT
columns.description: The initial date the visit contact was verified.

columns.name: VERIF_USER_ID
columns.description: This collects the user ID of the user who verified the visit.

columns.name: ENC_LACT_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The lactation status category ID for the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No


Unknown

columns.name: PAT_LACT_CMNT
columns.description: The comments entered when the patient's lactation status has been edited.

columns.name: COSIGNER_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who cosigned the patient's chart.

columns.name: COSIGN_REV_INS_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the chart was cosigned.

columns.name: PAR_DICT_COUNTER
columns.description: The counter for partial dictation.

columns.name: IS_LOS_UPDATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the status of any Level of Service updates.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


CHANGE LOS UPDATE SENT


TX LOCKED UPDATE SENT

columns.name: FORM_ID_COUNTER
columns.description: Stores the counter of form IDs.

columns.name: CONSNT_REV_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who reviewed patient consent.

columns.name: VISIT_PAYOR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the payor that is associated with this encounter.

columns.name: VISIT_PAYOR_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: VISIT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the plan that is associated with this encounter.

columns.name: VISIT_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: SOCIO_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the source of entry for the sociological history.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DOC_HX_SOURCE_C_NAME

columns.name: TEL_ENC_MSG_RGRDING
columns.description: Free-text field containing user entered information regarding a telephone encounter message.

columns.name: MSG_PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the priority of the routed message.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


High


Normal


Low

columns.name: RESEARCH_ENC_FLG_C_NAME
columns.description:
Category ID of the research encounter flag used to mark the patient encounter as having all charges billed to a research study, the patient, or a mixture.  This is used for charge routing.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Research - Bill All to Patient


Research - Bill All to Study


Research - Bill Some to Study and Some to Patient


Not Research - Bill All to Patient

columns.name: FAM_SPOUSE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the patient's spouse

columns.name: MSG_CALLER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the caller who left this message

columns.name: CONSENT_EXP_DATE
columns.description: This is the expiration date of any consent forms that are attached to the patient.

columns.name: CV_ACC4_PAT_RESP_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a patient wants identifying information to be excluded from submission to the American College of Cardiology-National Cardiovascular Data Registry's (ACC-NCDR) Catheterization and/or Percutaneous Coronary Intervention (CathPCI) registry.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: LD_STATUS_YN

columns.name: FAMILY_MEM_PREFIX_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the relationship between the patient and the patient's guarantor.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: AVS_REFUSED_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when an end user documented that the patient declined the After Visit Summary.

columns.name: AVS_LAST_PRINT_DTTM
columns.description: Records the instant the After Visit Summary was last printed

columns.name: MED_LIST_UPDATE_DTTM
columns.description: If a patient's prescriptions or Facility-Administered Medications (FAMs) are updated (signed, modified, or discontinued; or other med reconciliation actions are changed) after the After Visit Summary (AVS) has been printed, this item is updated to hold a timestamp indicating the last time that such updates were made. It is left blank if no AVS has been printed yet.
